ExpSyntax.val: '{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1255\deff0\deflang1037{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial Black;}{\f1\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}}{\colortbl ;\red255\green255\blue0;\red0\green128\blue0;\red51\green102\blue255;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\lang1033\b\f0\fs32 Magic \highlight1 Software\highlight0\par\pard\ltrpar\cf2\f1\fs40 \cf0 \cf3\fs48 RIA\cf0\lang1037\b0\f2\fs17\par}'

'Magic xpa is Magic Software''s comprehensive application platform and the next generation of the company''s award-winning eDeveloper series. It is also the industry''s first RIA and SaaS-enabled Application Platform (SEAP) that uses a single development paradigm to automatically handle all Client and Server partitioning. Unique to the market, Magic xpa gives you the power to choose how you deploy your applications, whether Full Client or Web; on-premise or on-demand; software or Software-as-a-Service (SaaS); or global or local. '
'Magic xpa is Magic Software''s comprehensive application platform and the next generation of the company''s award-winning eDeveloper series.'
